summary: Peter speaking Hebrew!!! Peter getting books and stuff to pick back up on it cause Ben was the only one who could teach him!!!...
question: Peter speaking Hebrew!!! Peter getting books and stuff to pick back up on it cause Ben was the only one who could teach him!!! Peter curing in it in front of tony who only speaks a little and replying to him in it!!!
answer:
YES!!

Peter growing up only speaking it a little.

His father actively encouraging him to lear.  

Both of his parents speak Hebrew but mostly speak English at home.

When they die, he moves in with Ben and May who speak mostly English and Spanish at home.

Ben teaches him Hebrew, but Peter is resistant.  It reminds him of his dad and sometimes he loves that and sometimes he hates it.

After Ben dies, Peter checks out stacks of audioboks to learn Hebrew and listens to them on the bus or the train.  

He reads books too, and one day Tony sees one in the tower on the coffee table when Peter is staying over.

Holding it up, he turns to Peter who is waiting for his pop tarts to pop up from the toaster.

“Spanish wasn’t enough?  Overachiever.”  He says in somewhat rusty Hebrew.

“You’re one to talk,”  Peter answers easily in the same language.  Tony raises his eyebrows so Peter switches back to English.  “My dad taught me growing up…both my parents spoke it at home.  And Ben…”  He trails off, shrugging and grabbing his breakfast.  

“My nanny growing up was Jewish,”  Tony tells him, putting an arm around his shoulders.  

Some days they only speak Hebrew in the lab, looking up terms they can’t remember, stammering and pointing and helping each other.  

Nothing has ever made Peter feel closer to his parents and uncle as improving his Hebrew with Mr. Stark.

YES!!

Peter growing up only speaking it a little.

His father actively encouraging him to lear.  

Both of his parents speak Hebrew but mostly speak English at home.

When they die, he moves in with Ben and May who speak mostly English and Spanish at home.

Ben teaches him Hebrew, but Peter is resistant.  It reminds him of his dad and sometimes he loves that and sometimes he hates it.

After Ben dies, Peter checks out stacks of audioboks to learn Hebrew and listens to them on the bus or the train.  

He reads books too, and one day Tony sees one in the tower on the coffee table when Peter is staying over.

Holding it up, he turns to Peter who is waiting for his pop tarts to pop up from the toaster.

“Spanish wasn’t enough?  Overachiever.”  He says in somewhat rusty Hebrew.

“You’re one to talk,”  Peter answers easily in the same language.  Tony raises his eyebrows so Peter switches back to English.  “My dad taught me growing up…both my parents spoke it at home.  And Ben…”  He trails off, shrugging and grabbing his breakfast.  

“My nanny growing up was Jewish,”  Tony tells him, putting an arm around his shoulders.

summary: Peter: Well, I don't know if you know this, but my uncle passed away. It's just been really hard to do anything. Fury: Date of...
body:
Peter: Well, I don't know if you know this, but my uncle passed away. It's just been really hard to do anything.

Fury: Date of passing?

Peter: Sorry?

Fury: When did he die?

Peter: Um, 2015.

Fury: Mm. Yeah, I have a one-year expiration date on freebies for the dead and dying.

Peter: Are you serious?

Fury: There will be other opportunities. Tony can't stick around forever.

dialogue.name: p
dialogue.phrase:
Peter: Well, I don't know if you know this, but my uncle passed away. It's just been really hard to do anything.

Fury: Date of passing?

Peter: Sorry?

Fury: When did he die?

Peter: Um, 2015.

Fury: Mm. Yeah, I have a one-year expiration date on freebies for the dead and dying.

Peter: Are you serious?

Fury: There will be other opportunities. Tony can't stick around forever.

blog.name: hellzyeahthewebwieldingavenger
blog.title: Hellz Yeah, Spider-Man: The Web Wielding Avenger
blog.description:
A blog all about my love for Peter Benjamin Parker, his friends, family, enemies and world in general. Expect images, rants, musings and long winded essays of the Web Head and why I think he's the greatest comic book Superhero of all time. 

I LOVE comments and questions so leave some as you pass by as well as call me on any facts I have gotten wrong.

Also check out my sub-pages for F.A.Q.s and a key for when I abbreviate.

summary: Just a thought…could this new centipede villain be some kind of pre-OMD version of Aunt May? It said it knows Peter better than...
text: Just a thought…could this new centipede villain be some kind of pre-OMD version of Aunt May? It said it knows Peter better than he knows himself or something along those lines. The Kingpin is subservient to him/her…the Kingpin is the one who had May shot during Back in Black, so maybe there is a connection there. Perhaps she was upset he revealed his id to Felicia because something bad happened to her because Peter’s id was exposed. Maybe since MJ/Pete are back together, it nullifies the deal made with Mephisto…
